task.title: Clean The Platen Roller
task.shortdesc: The first step in repairing a platen roller is to clean it. This will allow you to see any tears, cracks, or severe indents on the roller that may indicate further repairs are needed.

step.cmd: Activate the paper release lever so that the feed rollers and paper bail rollers are not touching the platen roller.
Apply a light layer of your lacquer thinner to a lint free cloth.
Rub the platen with the cloth along the cylinder, cleaning the entire surface of the roller.
Once the thinner has dried down, clean it once more with a clean lint free cloth and fresh lacquer thinner.
Repeat steps 2 and 3 until little to no residue is coming off on the cloth.
If you notice your feed rollers or paper bail rollers are a bit dirty, clean them with a new cloth and fresh lacquer thinner.
